thread.title: Trump Threatens To Pull Out Of Next GOP Debate
thread.title_full: Trump Threatens To Pull Out Of Next GOP Debate

author: Mehreen Kasana
title: Trump Threatens To Pull Out Of Next GOP Debate
text:
Trump Threatens To Pull Out Of Next GOP Debate POLITICO Posted: 10/15/2015 03:14 PM EDT ASSOCIATED PRESS 
A Republican National Committee conference call to discuss plans for the Oct. 28 GOP debate with top advisers to the presidential campaigns spiraled into chaos on Thursday afternoon, as Donald Trump threatened to pull out of the debate if his demands for the format are not met.
